resources.string:
Hello! My name is Devin. 

I am 33 years old. 

I enjoy video games, programming, small electronics, playing guitar, and coffee. 

I also enjoy playing golf, disc golf, and hiking. 

Here is a bunch of lorem ipsum text to pad the box and make it scroll:
